tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE top_performing_stocks (
    stock_symbol VARCHAR(255),
    company_name VARCHAR(255),
    performance_score FLOAT,
    market_cap DECIMAL,
    sector VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE stock_history ( 
	history_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
	stock_id INT, 
	date DATE NOT NULL, 
	high_price DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, 
	low_price DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, 
	close_price DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, 
	volume INT NOT NULL, 
	FOREIGN KEY (stock_id) REFERENCES stocks(stock_id) 
);

CREATE TABLE top_performing_stocks_view AS 
SELECT stock_id, stock_name, stock_price, stock_performance 
FROM stocks 
WHERE stock_performance > 0.8 
ORDER BY stock_performance DESC;

CREATE TABLE stocks (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name STRING,
    symbol STRING,
    price DECIMAL,
    volume INT
)

CREATE TABLE stock_performance (
    stock_id UUID REFERENCES stocks(id),
    performance_date DATE,
    closing_price DECIMAL,
    daily_return DECIMAL,
    PRIMARY KEY (stock_id, performance_date)
)

CREATE TABLE historical_data (
    record_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    stock_id UUID REFERENCES stocks(id),
    date DATE,
    open_price DECIMAL,
    high_price DECIMAL,
    low_price DECIMAL,
    volume INT
)

CREATE TABLE stock_ratings (
    stock_id UUID REFERENCES stocks(id),
    rating INT,
    rating_date DATE,
    PRIMARY KEY (stock_id, rating_date)
)

CREATE TABLE stock_view (
    stock_id UUID REFERENCES stocks(id),
    rank INT,
    performance_date DATE,
    closing_price DECIMAL,
    daily_return DECIMAL
)
